crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) {if (doc.pvt_type != 'rate_limits' || doc.pvt_deleted)return; var emit_records = function(Name, Type, Limits) { for (SipMethod in Limits.per_minute) { emit([Name, SipMethod], { 'type': Type, 'per_minute': Limits.per_minute[SipMethod] }) }; for (SipMethod in Limits.per_second) { emit([Name, SipMethod], { 'type': Type, 'per_second': Limits.per_second[SipMethod] }) }; }; if (doc.owner_type == 'account') { emit_records('device-default-rate-limits', 'device', doc.rate_limits.device); emit_records(doc.realm, 'realm', doc.rate_limits.account); } if (doc.owner_type == 'device') emit_records(doc.sip.username, 'device', doc.rate_limits); };

list_by_owner.map: function(doc) {if (doc.pvt_type != 'rate_limits' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_owner_id, doc._id || doc.id);}
